Mohd Jawed
5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for Work-from-Home at an Affordable Price!
Reviewed in India on 30 September 2024
Model: A1Verified Purchase
I recently bought the Rellon Industries Study Table (A1) for my work-from-home setup, and it's been a fantastic addition! Not only is it portable and lightweight, but the foldable design makes it easy to store away when not in use. I can easily move it from the bed to the couch or any corner of the house depending on where I want to work that day.

The table has enough space for my laptop, notebooks, and other essentials, and the sturdy build means it’s perfect for long working hours without any wobbling. What really stands out is the price—it’s incredibly affordable for the quality and versatility it offers. It’s been a budget-friendly solution to create a productive workspace at home without taking up too much room.

For anyone looking for an affordable, portable, and reliable table for work or study, this is a fantastic option. Highly recommended!

Vinay
5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product
Reviewed in India on 25 September 2024
Model: A1Verified Purchase
I recently purchased this study table, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with the quality and design. In this table both wood and plastic material used...The table is spacious enough to accommodate a laptop, books, and other essentials, yet compact enough to fit in small rooms. The sturdy build ensures it can handle daily use without any wobbling, and the smooth surface is easy to clean the stability of the table is too good..

RAJANANDHAN.V
4.0 out of 5 stars Good for value product
Reviewed in India on 6 August 2024
Model: A1Verified Purchase
A decent study table that quietly does its job. Feels quite sturdy. Plastic finishes feel quite cheap but for the price, that is okay. If height adjustment is available, adults too could have used it. But it is mainly designed and meant for kids, I suppose. A decent buy if you plan to use mainly for kids homework.
